❄️ **Bozeman Winter Outdoor Activities Guide**

Bozeman’s winter is packed with adventures for every age and activity level. From skiing Bridger Bowl and Nordic tracks at Crosscut, to snowshoeing in Hyalite or Sourdough, to skating at Southside Park — you’ve got endless options. Sledding at Peets Hill, fat biking snowy trails, and soaking at Bozeman Hot Springs are all local favorites. More offbeat? Try a full moon snowshoe, dog sledding day trip, or climbing frozen waterfalls in Hyalite. Whether you want family fun, solo serenity, or wild winter sports, Bozeman’s got it covered.
